class dtpr.geometry.dt_geometry.DTGeometry(xml_file)[source]

A class to represent the DT Geometry from an XML file.

Attributes

rootxml.etree.ElementTree.Element

The root element of the parsed XML tree.

get(attribute=None, **kwargs)[source]

Retrieve specific attributes or elements from the XML based on the provided criteria.

Parameters:

  • attribute (str, optional) – The attribute to retrieve (e.g., ‘GlobalPosition’, ‘LocalPosition’, ‘Bounds’).

  • kwargs (dict) – Additional criteria to filter the elements (e.g., rawId, wh, sec, st, sl, l).

Returns:

The requested attribute values or element text.

Return type:

tuple or str

Raises:

ValueError – If the element is not found for the given query.

static transform_to_pos(str_pos_tuple)[source]

Transform a string representation of coordinates into a tuple of floats.

Parameters:

  • str (str) – The string containing the coordinates.

  • local (bool, optional) – Flag to determine if the coordinates are local or global.

Returns:

A tuple containing the transformed coordinates.

Return type:

tuple
